name: cubby
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a very small room or space for storing things: His bedroom was about the size of my cubby at work. Her dining-room wall has multiple hooks for backpacks and coats, and each child has a cubby for shoes. Synonym
cubbyhole
More examplesFewer examplesWe had our contractor cut in to the pantry wall and build a cubby for the microwave to sit in.She is often rejected by the other children and goes and sits in her cubby. His office is a small cubby 12 floors up.I would plunge my hand into the cubby behind the handbrake hoping to find candy. Store policy was to have customers leave their bags in the cubbies by the door.
